thread.title: Pssst! Hey, Cobb: You can get free Chick-fil-A on Tuesday. Here’s how.
thread.title_full: Pssst! Hey, Cobb: You can get free Chick-fil-A on Tuesday. Here’s how.

author: Ben Brasch
title: Pssst! Hey, Cobb: You can get free Chick-fil-A on Tuesday. Here’s how.
text:
If you don’t hate Chick-fil-A then certainly you won’t hate free Chick-fil-A.
And you can get just that at multiple locations in Cobb on Tuesday. One of the locations is celebrating its 20th anniversary.
Many metro Atlanta outposts of the local chicken chain are giving away free Chick-n-Minis for breakfast. Get yourself some starting when the stores open until 10:30 a.m.
In other Cobb poultry news:
Chickens welcomed now in Marietta Big Chicken renovation: Here’s what it looks like these days Marietta locations on Roswell Road and Dallas Highway are participating, per posts from their Facebook pages.
If you can’t wait, the Dallas Highway restaurant is selling their classic chicken sandwiches Monday for $2.29 plus tax, which is the same price as when the store opened in 1997.
Like Cobb County News Now on Facebook | Follow us on Twitter and Instagram
If you’ll be in Gwinnett County on Tuesdy, see where the deal is there .
